dcterms:creator: H. Kawahara
I. Masuda-Katsuse
A. De Cheveigne
dcterms:description: STRAIGHT is a vocoder that adopts a pitch-synchronized mechanism with phasic interference reduction and oversmoothing compensation to extract stable spectra, which are highly uncorrelated to the instantaneous F0.
dcterms:title: STRAIGHT

dcterms:creator: M. Morise
F. Yokomori
K. Ozawa
dcterms:description: WORLD is a vocoder-based high-quality speech synthesis system designed for real-time applications, utilizing pitch-synchronized concepts for spectral analysis.
dcterms:title: WORLD

dcterms:creator: J. Kominek
A. W. Black
dcterms:description: The CMU ARCTIC speech databases are designed for speech synthesis research, providing a variety of speech samples for analysis and synthesis.
dcterms:title: CMU-ARCTIC

dcterms:creator: J. Lorenzo-Trueba
J. Yamagishi
T. Toda
D. Saito
F. Villavicencio
T. Kinnunen
Z. Ling
dcterms:description: The VCC2018 dataset promotes the development of voice conversion methods, providing a platform for evaluating parallel and nonparallel voice conversion techniques.
dcterms:title: VCC2018

dcterms:creator: P. L. Tobing
Y.-C. Wu
T. Hayashi
K. Kobayashi
T. Toda
dcterms:description: The NU voice conversion system is designed for the voice conversion challenge 2018, providing a framework for evaluating voice conversion techniques.
dcterms:title: NU voice conversion system

dcterms:description: The VCC2018 SPOKE set is referred to in the context of the evaluation corpus for voice conversion techniques.
dcterms:title: VCC2018 SPOKE set
